channel.title: pgp on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in pgp on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Signed PGP keys
item.description: ##01:20 Sunday 01 February 2015 JST## I verified and signed Travis’ GPG key today, though I don’t see my signature on MITs server (yet) https://pgp.mit.edu/pks/lookup?op=vindex&search=0x5669BC80C2AB241A Yumi giggled as we checked each other’s passports while standing in line for Shakey’s Pizza tonight. Deji had a couple of plates of pizzas, and I had a couple as well, plus a bowl of 枝豆 and a bit of corn, plus three small glasses of Calpis.
